long long ans = 0;
void create(int node, int ss, int se, int arr[], int stree[])
{
	if (ss == se)
	{
		stree[node] = ss;
		return;
	}
	int mid = (ss + se);
	mid = mid >> 1;
	create(2 * node, ss, mid, arr, stree);
	create(2 * node + 1, mid + 1, se, arr, stree);
	if (arr[stree[2 * node]] < arr[stree[2 * node + 1]])
		stree[node] = stree[2 * node];
	else
		stree[node] = stree[2 * node + 1];
}

int query(int node, int x, int y, int ss, int se, int arr[], int stree[])
{
	if (ss >= x && se <= y)
		return stree[node];
	int mid = (ss + se);
	mid = mid >> 1;

	if (se<x || mid + 1>y)
	{
		return query(2 * node, x, y, ss, mid, arr, stree);
	}
	if (ss>y || mid<x)
	{
		return query(2 * node + 1, x, y, mid + 1, se, arr, stree);
	}

	int p = query(2 * node, x, y, ss, mid, arr, stree);
	int q = query(2 * node + 1, x, y, mid + 1, se, arr, stree);

	if (arr[p] < arr[q])
		return p;
	else
		return q;

}

long long solve(int x, int y, int ss, int se, int arr[], int stree[])
{


	if (x > y)
		return 0;
	int index = query(1, x, y, 1, se, arr, stree);
	solve(x, index - 1, ss, se, arr, stree);
	solve(index + 1, y, ss, se, arr, stree);
	long long a, b, c;
	a = arr[index];
	b = index - x + 1;
	c = y - index + 1;
	ans += a*b*c;
	return ans;
}
long long sol(int n,int arr[])
{
	ans = 0;
	int *stree = new int[(n + 2) * 4];
	create(1, 1, n, arr, stree);
	 solve(1, n, 1, n, arr, stree);
	delete[] stree;
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t, n;
	long long ans = 0;
	s(t);

	while (t--)
	{
		ans = 0;
		s(n);
		int *arr = new int[n + 2];
		//long long *stree = new long long[(n + 2) * 4];
		forall(i, 1, n + 1)
		{
			sl(arr[i]);

		}


		printf("%lld\n", sol(n, arr));
		delete[] arr;
		//delete[] stree;

	}
	return 0;
}
